content:
# I have successfully harvested another 10 iron ore, bringing my inventory to 10 iron ore, 5 coal, and 5 stone.
# Now, I will insert the additional iron ore into the Stone Furnace to continue the smelting process.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inserted iron ore into the furnace. Inventory now: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after inserting iron ore.

# I will also check the status of the furnace to ensure it is processing the new iron ore correctly.
furnace_status = get_entities({Prototype.StoneFurnace})  # Get the status of the Stone Furnace
print(f"Furnace Status: {furnace_status}")  # Print the current status of the furnace.
